title.example: News from the COVID Tracking Project

addToCovidTrackingProjectWebsite.description: Whether the article should be included on the website.

date.description: Date for which the daily totals were collected.

states.description: Number of states included in the data for this day.

positive.description: Total number of people who have tested positive for COVID-19 so far.

negative.description: Total number of people who have tested negative for COVID-19 so far.

pending.description: Number of tests whose results have yet to be determined.

hospitalizedCurrently.description: Number of people in hospital for COVID-19 on this day.

hospitalizedCumulative.description: Total number of people who have gone to the hospital for COVID-19 so far, including those who have since recovered or died.

inIcuCurrently.description: Total number of people in the ICU for COVID-19 on this day.

inIcuCumulative.description: Total number of people who have gone to the ICU for COVID-19 so far, including those who have since recovered or died.

onVentilatorCurrently.description: Number of people using a ventilator for COVID-19 on this day.

onVentilatorCumulative.description: Total number of people who have used a ventilator for COVID-19 so far, including those who have since recovered or died.

recovered.description: Total number of people who have recovered from COVID-19 so far.

dateChecked.description: DateTime this data was entered into our database.

death.description: Total number of people who have died as a result of COVID-19 so far.

anyPosData.description: The state reports any positive case data by race/ethnicity.

anyDeathData.description: The state reports any death data by race/ethnicity.

anyPosData.description: The state reports any positive case data by race/ethnicity.

anyDeathData.description: The state reports any death data by race/ethnicity.

blackLivesLost.description: Number of black lives lost to the coronavirus.

blackLivesExpectedMultiplier.description: Expected lives lost based on population.

statesReportingCases.description: The number of states reporting cases broken down by race or ethnicity.

statesReportingDeaths.description: The number of states reporting deaths broken down by race or ethnicity.

covid19Site.description: URL to the state's COVID website

covid19SiteSecondary.description: URL to the state's secondary COVID website

covid19SiteTertiary.description: URL to the state's tertiary COVID website

covid19SiteOld.description: URL to the state's old COVID website

date.description: Date for which the daily totals were collected.

fips.description: Census FIPS code for the state.
fips.x-internalNote: This is computed from [this static list of FIPS codes](https://github.com/COVID19Tracking/covid-public-api-build/blob/master/config/state-names.js)

positive.description: Total number of people who have tested positive for COVID-19 so far.

positiveIncrease.x-internalNote: This field is computed by subtracting the proir date's value for positive from the current date

negative.description: Total number of people who have tested negative for COVID-19 so far.

negativeIncrease.x-internalNote: This field is computed by subtracting the proir date's value for negative from the current date

pending.description: Number of tests whose results have yet to be determined.

total.x-internalNote: This is a deprecated that adds up Positive, Negative, and Pending spreadsheet fields.

totalTestResults.description: Total Test Results Provided by the State
totalTestResults.x-internalNote: Adds up Positive and Negative spreadsheet fields.

totalTestResultsIncrease.x-internalNote: This field is computed by subtracting the proir date's value for `totalTestResults` from the current date

posNeg.x-internalNote: Adds up Positive and Negative spreadsheet fields.

hospitalizedCurrently.description: Number of people in hospital for COVID-19 on this day.

hospitalizedCumulative.description: Total number of people who have gone to the hospital for COVID-19 so far, including those who have since recovered or died.

inIcuCurrently.description: Total number of people in the ICU for COVID-19 on this day.

inIcuCumulative.description: Total number of people who have gone to the ICU for COVID-19 so far, including those who have since recovered or died.

onVentilatorCurrently.description: Number of people using a ventilator for COVID-19 on this day.

onVentilatorCumulative.description: Total number of people who have used a ventilator for COVID-19 so far, including those who have since recovered or died.

recovered.description: Total number of people who have recovered from COVID-19 so far.

dataQualityGrade.description: Grade assigned to the state based on the quality of their data reporting.

lastUpdateEt.description: Last time the day's data was updated.

dateModified.x-internalNote: This is a re-formatted value of "Last Update ET" forced into UTC format for historic reasons.

checkTimeEt.x-internalNote: This is a re-formatted value of "Last Update ET" forced into LL/dd HH:mm America/New_York format for historic reasons.

death.description: Total number of people who have died as a result of COVID-19 so far.

deathIncrease.x-internalNote: This field is computed by subtracting the proir date's value for `death` from the current date

hospitalizedIncrease.x-internalNote: An increase compuation for the old label for hospitalized.

dateChecked.x-internalNote: This is an old label for "Last Update ET".

hash.description: Deprecated - A hash of the current record.
hash.x-internalNote: A hash we provide for consumers so they can invalidate their cache if the values of this row has changed.

totalTestsViral.description: Total number of PCR tests performed.

positiveTestsViral.description: Total number of positive PCR tests.

negativeTestsViral.description: Total number of negative PCR tests.

positiveCasesViral.description: Total number of positive cases measured with PCR tests.

buildTime.description: The last time the API was built.

runNumber.description: The run ID. Set to zero if it is a non-production run.

production.description: Whether this is a production build of the API.
